src:
West Java Festival 2019 di Bandung Elaborasikan Unsur Budaya dan Wisata
01 Nov 2019, 18:04 by Amelia Hastuti



West Java Festival 2019 di Bandung Elaborasikan Unsur Budaya dan Wisata



West Java Festival 2019 di Bandung Elaborasikan Unsur Budaya dan Wisata


KBRN, Bandung : Ribuan orang menghadiri West Java Festival 2019, yang digelar dalam rangkaian peringatan hari ulang tahun Jawa Barat ke-74 di area Gedung Sate dan Lapangan Gasibu Jalan Diponegoro Kota Bandung, Jumat (1/11/2019).West Java Festival yang dibuka sejak pagi tadi setelah diresmikan oleh Asisten Perekonomian dan Pembangunan Setda Jawa Bara Eddy Iskandar Muda Nasution, mengambil tema Keanekaragaman Budaya, diisi dengan berbagai kegiatan seperti Pesta Buah dan Sayur, karnaval busana lagenda serta menampilkan sejumlah artis ibu kota antara lain Isyana Sarasvati, Barasuara, Dewi Gita, Rida Sita Dewi, Andy RIF serts grub band Gigi.Asisten Perekonomian dan Pembangunan Setda Jabar Eddy Iskandar Muda Nasution menilai, acara west Java Festival mampu mengelaborasi berbagai unsur dalam budaya dan wisata, sehingga ia memberikan apresiasi yang tinggi kepada pihak penyelenggara.Menurutnya, kegiatan itu diselenggarakan untuk menghargai keragaman budaya dan didedikasikan untuk menguatkan ekonomi dan kunjungan wisata di Jawa Barat Kepala Dinas Pariwisata dan Pariwisata Jawa Barat Dedi Taufik Kurohman kepada RRI mengatakan, even  West Java Festival sudah menjadi even tahunan dalam memicu kunjungan wisatawan ke Jawa Barat khususnya kota Bandung." Besok ada Karnaval Busana Lagenda melibatkan 4 provinsi di luar Jabar, yakni Sulawesi Tengah, Kalimantan Timur, DKI Jakarta dan Bangka Belitung, 27 Kabupaten Kota di Jabar serta 22 organisasi perangkat daerah Provinsi Jawa Barat," ujarnya.Dalam kegiatan tersebut kata Dedi, ada sebanyak 262 both dan masih banyak yang masih ingin ikut untuk memeriahkan festival yang akan berlangsung hingga Minggu, termasuk dari generasi Milenial dan Genpi."Bahkan dari target 25 ribu pengunjung yang mendaftar secara on line kata Dedi, yang mendaftar lebih dari 55 ribu orang lebih,"imbuhnya.Sementara berdasarkan laporan dari PHRI ujar Dedi,  West Java Festival memberikan dampak positif, karena adanya peningkatan okupansi hotel yang cukup bagus  disekitar Gedung Sate Bandung.
text:
West Java Festival 2019 in Bandung Elaborates Cultural and Tourism Elements
Nov 01 2019, 18:04 by Amelia Hastuti



West Java Festival 2019 in Bandung Elaborates Cultural and Tourism Elements



West Java Festival 2019 in Bandung Elaborates Cultural and Tourism Elements


KBRN, Bandung: Thousands of people attended the 2019 West Java Festival, which was held in a series of commemoration of the 74th anniversary of West Java in the area of Gedung Sate and Gasibu Field, Jalan Diponegoro, Bandung, Friday (11/01/2019). opened since this morning after it was inaugurated by the Assistant of Economy and Development of the Regional Secretariat of East Java, Eddy Iskandar Muda Nasution, taking the theme of Cultural Diversity, filled with various activities such as the Fruit and Vegetable Feast, a carnival with fashions and featuring a number of capital artists including Isyana Sarasvati, Barasuara, Dewi Gita, Rida Sita Dewi, Andy RIF serts grub Gigi band. The Assistant for Economy and Development of West Java Regional Secretariat Eddy Iskandar Muda Nasution assessed, the west Java Festival was able to elaborate various elements in culture and tourism, so he gave high appreciation to the organizers. , the activity was held to respect cultural diversity and was dedicated to strengthening eco nomi and tourist visits in West Java Head of the West Java Tourism and Tourism Office Dedi Taufik Kurohman told RRI that the West Java Festival event has become an annual event in triggering tourist visits to West Java, especially in the city of Bandung. "Tomorrow there is a Lagenda Clothing Carnival involving 4 provinces in outside West Java, namely Central Sulawesi, East Kalimantan, DKI Jakarta and Bangka Belitung, 27 City Regencies in West Java and 22 regional apparatus organizations in West Java Province, "he said. In the activity said Dedi, there were 262 both and many still wanted to participate to enliven the festival which will last until Sunday, including from Millennial and Genpi generation. "Even from the target of 25 thousand visitors who register online said Dedi, who registered more than 55 thousand people," he added. Meanwhile based on reports from PHRI said Dedi , West Java Festival has a positive impact, because there is an increase in hotel occupancy which is quite good Kitar Gedung Bandung.
